cern.extjfx.chart.data

Interface DataReducer<X extends Number,Y extends Number>

  • Type Parameters:
    X - type of X values
    Y - type of Y values
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDataReducer, LinearDataReducer

    public interface DataReducer<X extends Number,Y extends Number>
    Strategy reducing the number of data points.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<XYChart.Data<X,Y>> reduce(ChartData<X,Y> data, Range<Double> dataRange, int maxPointsCount)
      Reduces the number of data points to be equal or less than specified maxPointsCount.

    • Method Detail

      • reduce

        List<XYChart.Data<X,Y>> reduce(ChartData<X,Y> data,
                               Range<Double> dataRange,
                               int maxPointsCount)
        Reduces the number of data points to be equal or less than specified maxPointsCount.
        Parameters:
        data - data to be reduced
        dataRange - range of data (lowerBound and upperBound) from which given data should be reduced
        maxPointsCount - the maximum number of points that the reduced list should contain
        Returns:
        list containing reduced data, with maximum maxPointsCount elements
